titleStmt.title: A Checklist of Recent Blake Scholarship
titleStmt.author: Ron Taylor

publicationStmt.publisher: Department of English, University of New Mexico

title.hi: A Checklist of Recent Blake Scholarship

div1.note: Ron Taylor, an advanced graduate student in English at Berkeley, is the Bibliographer for the News letter.

div2.p: Anon. “Bibliography: the Eighteenth Century.” Philological Quarterly, Fall 1974 number.
